original_title: Gala JPR 2021 - Les Soirées Carte Blanche Jean-Thomas Jobin et Rita Baga
overview: For his first animation of a Carte blanche Just for Laughs, Jean-Thomas Jobin relies on an unexpected ally, the drag-queen Rita Baga. On stage, their worlds will coexist and intertwine. A meeting between “absurdity and flamboyance” which promises to surprise
title: Gala JPR 2021 - Les Soirées Carte Blanche Jean-Thomas Jobin et Rita Baga
